summary:
Tired of running through two loading screens to get to the Ragged Flagon?  This mod attempts to make it easier to get to Tonilia and the Thieves Guild quest NPCs by adding a manhole in Riften leading directly to the Flagon, and a ladder from there leading back out to Riften.

Note: If you use the Open Cities mod, this mod will not be compatible.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

Tired of running through two loading screens to get to the Ragged Flagon? This mod attempts to make it easier to get to Tonilia and the Thieves Guild quest NPCs by adding a manhole in Riften leading directly to the Flagon, and a ladder from there leading back out to Riften.

Usage:

Initially, you\'ll find the manhole locked from the outside. This is just to help prevent the mod from letting you skip past the normal way of gaining entrance to the Thieves Guild and potentially breaking vanilla quest scripts. The key is on the table in the little \"break room\" area right next to the door between the Flagon and the Cistern inside the Thieves Guild. The new inside ladder is in a new tunnel directly across from that room.

Installation:

This is all just in an esp file. Drop \"raggedshortcut.esp\" into your skyrim/Data folder, then open the skyrim launcher, select Data Files, and make sure the new esp is checked off in the list before you start up the game.  

If you use the \"Open Cities\" mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8058), use \"raggedshortcut_oc.esp\" instead.  Tested with Open Cities v0.33.
author: cruinh
